H0.text: The A57 road runs from Liverpool to which English town or city. Manchester

H1.text: The A57 road runs from Liverpool to which English town or city. Sheffield

H2.text: The A57 road runs from Liverpool to which English town or city. Leeds

H3.text: The A57 road runs from Liverpool to which English town or city. Lincon

A4.text: It runs east from Liverpool to Lincoln via Warrington, Salford and Manchester

A5.text: It enters Lincoln as Carholme Road passing the Total Winning Post Service Station
